Npc1099:
ï¿½I wish I could recover my PP just by drinking water...[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]
ï¿½Even though I have never seen him before, I heard that the prince can do that.[WAIT][LINE_BREAK]

ï¿½By the way, just what is PP anyway?...[HALT][END]
